video.title: Slugterra
video.synopsis: Tasked with protecting the subterranean denizens of Slugterra, a teenage slug-slinger vows to become the underground realm's greatest hero.

episodes.synopsis: Teen Eli Shane is just a regular kid from the suburbs, one of a long line of Shanes who protect Slugterra and the slugs in the underground world.
episodes.title: The World Beneath Our Feet, Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Eli Shane is the latest in a long line of Shanes to protect Slugterra and the slugs that make the underground world so special.
episodes.title: The World Beneath Our Feet, Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: After the Shane hideout is ransacked, the gang trades in one of Eli's prized slugs for new gear.
episodes.title: The Trade

episodes.synopsis: When the punks in the Hooligang cruise into Quiet Lawn Cavern, they think no one there has the guts to stand up to them -- so they trash the place.
episodes.title: The Slugout

episodes.synopsis: The gang signs up for a weekend camp that promises to teach slugs tons of new moves -- without lifting a finger.
episodes.title: Club Slug

episodes.synopsis: The Slug Run is the ultimate off-road, no-holds-barred, cross-cavern Mecha Beast race.
episodes.title: The Slug Run

episodes.synopsis: Kord can't find a way to fix what's wrong with the new upgrades to the Shane Gang's Mecha Beasts.
episodes.title: Mecha Mutiny

episodes.synopsis: Eli doesn't believe in ghosts, until he enters Deadweed cavern.
episodes.title: Deadweed

episodes.synopsis: A short cut takes the Shane Gang through the territory of the Shadow Clan, and they are captured by the mysterious creatures.
episodes.title: Shadows and Light

episodes.synopsis: Pronto is thrown in jail on trumped-up charges by a corrupt judge, and the only chance to break him out is Eli making a one-in-a-million trick shot.
episodes.title: Mario Bravado

episodes.synopsis: Long thought to be merely a legend, an Enigmo Slug has finally been spotted.
episodes.title: Endangered Species

episodes.synopsis: After a wild ride on the Flumes, the Shane gang find themselves dropped into a sea cavern.
episodes.title: Undertow

episodes.synopsis: A fun trip to the mall cavern turns un-deadly when the place is overrun by the zombie-like victims of the Zombus slug.
episodes.title: Dawn of the Slug

episodes.synopsis: After being chased by one of Dr. Blakk's men, the Shane Gang is saved by a new kid named Twist.
episodes.title: The New Kid, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The four members of the Shane Gang believe they've found a fifth in street-smart Twist, who volunteers to help when the gang needs it most.
episodes.title: The New Kid Part 2

episodes.synopsis: An avalanche traps the Shane Gang inside a frozen cavern with a vicious ice ogre.
episodes.title: Snowdance

episodes.synopsis: A female thief breaks into the gang's headquarters looking for the fabled Shane treasure, a portion of which she believes belongs to her.
episodes.title: Inheritance

episodes.synopsis: Notorious con man Gar Revelle claims that he's discovered the way to a secret land, which seems to be the surface!
episodes.title: A Distant Shore

episodes.synopsis: Eli ends up fighting a duel -- without his best slugs!
episodes.title: The Journey Home

episodes.synopsis: Driven by his intense slugphobia, mad scientist Quentin Kozinski has invented mechanical slugs, claiming that they can beat real ones.
episodes.title: Roboslugs

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious slug-slinging master appears for the first time in 20 years, looking to train a student.
episodes.title: The Unbeatable Master

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Blakk hires a brutal thug to build a deep-water rig to drill for dark water at the bottom of the Cavern Sea.
episodes.title: Deep Water Dark Water

episodes.synopsis: Using some stolen technology, Dana Por is able to slip in and out of any cavern in Slugterra -- and rob everyone blind!
episodes.title: The Gentlemen and the Thief

episodes.synopsis: A swarm of Neurotox ghoul slugs have created a massive toxic cloud that's attacking the residents of Lumino Cavern.
episodes.title: No Exit

episodes.synopsis: Eli and Kord attempt to create a fusion shot, which entails shooting two slugs at exactly the same time to merge their powers.
episodes.title: The Hard Part

episodes.synopsis: When Eli and the Shane Gang get trapped in the Deep Caverns beneath Slugterra, they discover a new type of danger threatening to escape.
episodes.title: What Lies Beneath

episodes.synopsis: Armed with his powerful new weapon, the Gatling Blaster, Blakk's unstoppable battle train threatens to run roughshod over all of Slugterra.
episodes.title: The Return

episodes.synopsis: The Shane Gang find themselves competing in the Slugball Championship.
episodes.title: Slugball

episodes.synopsis: Locke and Lode have run roughshod over a cavern and the Shane Gang aims to kick them out.
episodes.title: King of Sling

episodes.synopsis: The Shane Gang's been captured by the zombifying Mr. Saturday.
episodes.title: Mission Improbable

episodes.synopsis: The Shane Gang follows Diablos Nacho to Molemound, the Molenoid home cavern.
episodes.title: Keys to the Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes are lured into an elaborate game by a twisted villain calling himself the Game Master.
episodes.title: The Thrill of the Game

episodes.synopsis: Burpy is sick, and the only thing that will cure him is a trip to the Lightwell, a mysterious hidden power source only slugs know the way to.
episodes.title: Lightwell

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious creature is draining the energy from all the slugs in a distant cavern. The residents are offering a rich reward to whomever can stop it.
episodes.title: It Comes By Night

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Blakk has been captured. Now, it's up to the Shane Gang to transport him to Stalagmite 17, the only prison that can hold him.
episodes.title: Upgrade

episodes.synopsis: While the rest of the Shane Gang defend the perimeter from the Blakk Guards sent to free Dr. Blakk from prison, Eli interrogates the captured villain.
episodes.title: Back to Blakk

episodes.synopsis: Eli's got a new slug recruit, but in the heat of battle, can this rookie go from frightened novice to the hero of the day?
episodes.title: Bandoleer of Brothers

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Blakk and his Darkbane minions have discovered a way to make their ghouls faster and stronger.
episodes.title: Dark As Night

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Blakk has succeeded in creating a gap in the magical slug-energy barrier that protects Slugterra.
episodes.title: Light As Day
